source.query:
SELECT   mrtg_id	
		,customer_id
		,router_id
		,interface_id
		,billing_date
		,billing_usage
		,date_created
		,date_updated
		,created_by
		,updated_by
		,round(billing_usage_in)	billing_usage_in
		,round(billing_usage_out)	billing_usage_out
		,billing_id
		,campus
		,product_line
		,period_name
		,file_name
FROM	mrtgbilling.mrtg_billing 
WHERE billing_date >= sysdate -500
